verses.text: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, \add unto thee\add* do we give thanks: For \add that\add* thy name \add is\add* near thy wondrous works declare.
When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
The earth and all the inhabitants thereof \add are\add* dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.
I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: And to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
Lift not up your horn on high: Speak \add not\add* with a stiff neck.
For promotion \add cometh\add* neither from the east, Nor from the west, nor from the south.
But God \add is\add* the judge: He putteth down one, and setteth up another.

For in the hand of the \sc Lord\sc* \add there is\add* a cup, and the wine is red; It is full \add of\add* mixture; and he poureth out of the same: But the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring \add them\add* out, \add and\add* drink \add them\add*.
But I will declare for ever; I will sing \add praises\add* to the God of Jacob.
All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; \add But\add* the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
